trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived form, provides functionality for tasks.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生窗体中重写，请为任务提供功能。

trans-unit.source: This abstract class provides default implementations for the methods and properties of the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITask> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此抽象类提供的方法和属性的默认实现<xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITask>接口。</xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITask>

trans-unit.source: This class can only be instantiated in a derived form.
trans-unit.target: 仅可以在派生窗体中实例化此类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Utilities.Task"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="Microsoft.Build.Utilities.Task"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Utilities.Task"></xref> class with the specified <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.Task.TaskResources*>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="Microsoft.Build.Utilities.Task"></xref>指定<xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.Task.TaskResources*>.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.Task.TaskResources*>类

trans-unit.source: This constructor allows derived task classes to register their resources.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数允许派生的任务类进行注册它们的资源。

trans-unit.source: The task resources.
trans-unit.target: 任务资源。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Utilities.Task"></xref> class with the specified <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.Task.TaskResources*> and <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.Task.HelpKeywordPrefix*>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="Microsoft.Build.Utilities.Task"></xref>使用指定的类<> *1> 和<> *1>。

trans-unit.source: This constructor allows derived task classes to register their resources, as well as provide a prefix for composing help keywords from string resource names.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数允许派生的任务类进行注册它们的资源，以及提供用于编写 help 关键字通过字符串资源名称的前缀。

trans-unit.source: If `helpKeywordPrefix` is an empty string, string resource names will be used verbatim as help keywords.
trans-unit.target: 如果`helpKeywordPrefix`为空字符串，将按原义 help 关键字用作使用名称的字符串资源。

trans-unit.source: The task resources.
trans-unit.target: 任务资源。

trans-unit.source: The prefix to append to string resources to create Help keywords.
trans-unit.target: 要追加到字符串资源以创建帮助关键字的前缀。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.IBuildEngine"></xref> object used by the task.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的实例<xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.IBuildEngine"></xref>任务所使用的对象。

trans-unit.source: The build engine automatically sets this property to allow tasks to call back into it.
trans-unit.target: 生成引擎会自动设置此属性，以允许任务回调到其中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.IBuildEngine"></xref> available to tasks.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.IBuildEngine"> </xref>可供任务。

trans-unit.source: Gets the instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.IBuildEngine2"></xref> object used by the task.
trans-unit.target: 获取实例<xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.IBuildEngine2"></xref>任务所使用的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.IBuildEngine2"></xref> available to tasks.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.IBuildEngine2"> </xref>可供任务。

trans-unit.source: Gets the instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.IBuildEngine3"></xref> object used by the task.
trans-unit.target: 获取实例<xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.IBuildEngine3"></xref>任务所使用的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.IBuildEngine3"></xref> available to tasks.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.IBuildEngine3"> </xref>可供任务。

trans-unit.source: Gets the instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.IBuildEngine4"></xref> object used by the task.
trans-unit.target: 获取实例<xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.IBuildEngine4"></xref>任务所使用的对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.IBuildEngine4"></xref> available to tasks.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.IBuildEngine4"></xref>可供任务。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, executes the task.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，将执行任务。

trans-unit.source: This class must be overridden in a derived class, and is used for performing task execution logic.
trans-unit.target: 此类必须在派生类中重写，并用于执行任务的执行逻辑。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the task successfully executed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已成功执行任务;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the prefix used to compose Help keywords from resource names.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于通过资源名称组成 Help 关键字的前缀。

trans-unit.source: If a task does not have Help keywords associated with its messages, it can ignore this property or set it to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果任务不具有与其消息关联的 Help 关键字，则它可以忽略此属性或将其设置为`null`。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to an empty <xref:System.String>, resource names will be used verbatim as Help keywords.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性设置为一个空<xref:System.String>，将按原义 Help 关键字用作使用资源名称。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The prefix used to compose Help keywords from resource names.
trans-unit.target: 用于通过资源名称组成 Help 关键字的前缀。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the host object associated with the task.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与任务相关联的宿主对象。

trans-unit.source: If the host IDE has associated a host object with this particular task, then the build engine sets this property.
trans-unit.target: 如果主机 IDE 具有与此特定任务关联的主机对象，则生成引擎会设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: The host object is provided by <xref:Microsoft.Build.Execution.HostServices>.
trans-unit.target: 由<xref:Microsoft.Build.Execution.HostServices>.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Execution.HostServices>提供该主机对象

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio determines the host object via a system registry key.
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio 会确定该主机对象通过系统注册表项。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Shell.Interop.IVsMSBuildHostObject>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Shell.Interop.IVsMSBuildHostObject>。</xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Shell.Interop.IVsMSBuildHostObject>

trans-unit.source: The host object associated with the task.
trans-unit.target: 与任务关联的宿主对象。

trans-unit.source: This value can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此值可为<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of a <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TaskLoggingHelper"></xref> class containing task logging methods.
trans-unit.target: 获取实例<xref href="Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TaskLoggingHelper"></xref>包含任务日志记录方法的类。

trans-unit.source: The logging helper object.
trans-unit.target: 日志记录帮助程序对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the culture-specific resources associated with the task.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与任务关联的区域性特定资源。

trans-unit.source: If derived classes have localized strings, then they should register their resources either during construction, or through this property.
trans-unit.target: 如果派生的类具有本地化字符串，则应在构造期间或通过此属性注册其资源。

trans-unit.source: The culture-specific resources associated with the task.
trans-unit.target: 与任务关联的区域性特定资源。

trans-unit.source: This value can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此值可为<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。
